ClickMechanic - Full-stack Engineer | London, UK (Shepherd's Bush) | Full-time, Onsite

ClickMechanic is an online marketplace that lets you easily and transparently book a mobile car mechanic. We're looking for an experienced Rails developer to join us at our London offices. You'll be part a small team of developers, and should familiar with:

  - Ruby on Rails
  - ERB, SASS & CoffeeScript
  - Postgresql
  - git
  - TDD (we use Minitest + RSpec Mocks)
Email us at jobs@clickmechanic.com if this sounds like your kind of thing, including your CV and/or Github profile.
